09-26-2024: - Bullet damage growth reduced from 0.5 to 0.45
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash fire rate slow reduced from 30% to 20%
- Fixed various issues with {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike pathing
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation duration reduced from 5s to 4.5s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T3 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation no longer provides unlimited ammo
09-12-2024: - Ammo now scales with Spirit Power (0.15)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash damage reduced from 170 to 160
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Grapple|Size=20} Grapple post cast duration reduced from 0.5 to 0.2
- Alt fire now fixed to work with conditional damage sources (point blank, pristine emblem, etc)
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation bullet and spirit resistance reduced from 55% to 40%
- Can now interrupt {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash with parry
08-29-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash max damage time requirement reduced from 1.5s to 1.4s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash collision radius reduced by 8%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash radius increased from 12m to 13m
- Fixed being able to die during {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation if hit by Grey Talon's Owl
- Fixed some cases where {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike could get into a stuck state
- Fixed some cases where {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash would appear to be cast when it wasn't
08-15-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike T3 now procs after the ability ends, rather than when connecting to the target
08-01-2024: - Fixed crosshair sometimes being stuck hidden for Yamato after {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike was interrupted
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash collision size reduced by 10%
- Bullet damage growth increased from 0.4 to 0.5
07-11-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation incoming damage reduction reduced from 70% to 55%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation changed from 70% debuff reduction to the same buff as Unstoppable
06-27-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash damage reduced from 175 to 170
- Can now cancel {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation damage and debuff resistance reduced from 80% to 70%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation duration increased from 4.5s to 5s
06-23-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation now causes you to be unable to die during the buff
06-20-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation now provides 80% Damage Resistance and 80% Debuff Resistance instead of invulnerability during the post-channel buff
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation cooldown reduced from 110s to 100s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T3 increased from +1s to +1.5s
06-13-2024: - Fixed Yamato's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash visual direction being wrong sometimes
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash T3 bonus damage reduced from +210 to +200
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation cooldown increased from 100 to 110
05-30-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash spirit scaling improved from 1.6 to 2.0
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash no longer does a very minor movement on enemies hit
- Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash sometimes not being a full charge when channeled fully during the Shadow Transformation
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation's ability speedup now affects the post-cast durations as well
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation's ability speedup now improves the visual animations (cosmetic only change)
05-23-2024: - Fixed missing VO for {AbilityIcon|Ability=Yamato|Size=20} Yamato ability use/upgrades
- Shadow Explosion renamed to {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation and reworked into a new ability
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation no longer has radius impact behavior

- Shadow Transformation now gives you 4.5s of invulnerability after the initial 2s invulnerable channel period. You transform and refresh your abilities, improving ability speeds by 60% and gaining unlimited ammo. "Ability Speeds" affects {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash cast time, Flying Strike flying time, and Crimson Slash cast time.
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation cooldown increased from 90s to 100s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T2 is now +4 m/s during Shadow Form
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20} Shadow Transformation T3 is now +1s duration
05-16-2024: - Shadow Explosion cooldown reduced from 120s to 90s
05-10-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash cooldown reduced from 13s to 11s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash physics/world collision reduced from 15 to 4 (allowing it to be more easily used near objects)
- Shadow Explosion radius increased from 14m to 16m
- Shadow Explosion {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate and Spirit buff duration increased from 15s to 20s
- Shadow Explosion T3 Spirit bonus increased from +10% to +15%
- Shadow Explosion T3 {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate bonus increased from +5% to +10%
05-03-2024: - Removed the slow climbing vertical recoil on {AbilityIcon|Ability=Yamato|Size=20} Yamato's alt fire
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash radius increased from 11m to 12m
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash fire rate debuff duration increased from 3s to 4s
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash T2 changed from "-5s Cooldown" to "10% Max Health heal on hero hit"
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20} Crimson Slash T3 changed from "12% Max Health heal on hero hit" to "-6s Cooldown"
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20} Power Slash T1 Bullet Resist increased from 40% to 60%
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike cooldown reduced from 35 to 20
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike T2 changed from "-15s Cooldown" to "+20 Cast Range"
- {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike range no longer scales with Spirit
- Shadow Explosion bonus Spirit per victim increased from 10 to 15
- Shadow Explosion bonus {AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20} Fire Rate per victim increased from 5 to 10
- Shadow Explosion buff duration increased from 8s to 15s
